about.description: Hi! I'm Ashfaq Ahmed and I'm a Software Engineer with a passion in Full Stack development. I'm a Computer Science Engineer from the class of 2020. I'm currently working at OpenText Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. I aspire towards a career that will allow me to channel my creativity through crafting beautiful software and engaging experiences.
about.hobbies: When I'm not on the computer, I enjoy playing table tennis, swimming and reading books.
about.skillsDescription: I've been doing Software Development for about 2 years now, and I'm always eager to learn more in the fast paced industry.
about.getInTouchDescription: Whether you have an idea for a project or just want to chat, feel free to write to me or shoot me an email!

works.name: Share Files
works.description: Share Files is a file sharing application through links.

works.name: Todo
works.description: TODO app made with ReactJS. Uses local storage to store the todos.

works.name: Amazon Clone
works.description: Amazon clone made with ReactJS with complete functionality along with payments.

works.name: iMessage Clone
works.description: iMessage clone made with ReactJS and Redux. Uses firebase to store the chat and messages.

works.name: Covid19 Tracker
works.description: Covid-19 Tracker made with ReactJS. Uses disease.sh apis to get the data.

works.name: Coloors
works.description: Coloors is a UI color picker app which can store color palettes. It uses localstorage to store the palettes.

works.name: Beat maker
works.description: Beat maker can make music with different Kick, snare and hihat sound effects with different tempos.

works.name: Discord Clone
works.description: Discord clone made with ReactJS and Redux. Uses firebase to store the chat and messages.

works.name: Facebook Clone
works.description: Facebook clone made with ReactJS. Uses google firebase authentication and firestore to store the posts

works.name: Hulu Clone
works.description: Hulu clone made with ReactJS. Uses TMDB apis to fetch the data.

works.name: Google Clone
works.description: Google clone made with ReactJS. Uses google's custom search api for search functionality.

works.name: Slack Clone
works.description: Slack clone made with ReactJS. Uses firebase to store the chat and messages.

works.name: Recipe search
works.description: Recipe search app made with ReactJS. Uses edamam food api and limits to only 5 searches/min.

works.name: Spotify Clone
works.description: Spotify clone made with ReactJS. Uses spotify developers api to display Discover Weekly.

works.name: Airbnb Clone
works.description: Airbnb clone made with ReactJS. It doesn't cover any functionality but frontend.

works.name: Instagram Reels Clone
works.description: IG Reels clone made with ReactJS. The video links in it might have expired till you view this.

works.name: Tinder Clone
works.description: Tinder clone made with MERN stack. Uses MongoDB to store the tinder cards data.

works.description: IG Reels clone made with MERN stack. The video links in it might have expired till you view this.
